entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
